nodes.text: Balmgruyt was a beverage that could be found on the Core Worlds planet Chandrila. In 5 ABY, two New Republic pilots that the former Imperial loyalty officer Sinjir Rath Velus dubbed "Mister Browscar" and "Miss Scowlface" entered a Junari Point bar and  briskly ordered balmgruyts from the bartender of the establishment, who left her post to fetch the drinks for them.
Balmgruyt was first mentioned in Aftermath: Life Debt, a 2016 novel written by Chuck Wendig.
